ip::v4_mapped_t

Tag type used for distinguishing overloads that deal in IPv4-mapped IPv6 addresses. 

enum v4_mapped_t

Values

v4_mapped
Requirements

Header: boost/asio/ip/address_v6.hpp

Convenience header: boost/asio.hpp
